comment:
Sorry this is long  just my opinion.....I believe in this case, that AH is the abuser, not the other way around, she has tried to manipulate the court system, not just in the UK case, but here in the US, everywhere,  to make JD look like the abuser, Possible Crimes should be brought against her, that can & should be prosecuted as such.  She has filed a counterclaim against JD's Def case, which is where the subpoena's are coming from, she is ridiculous, maybe there is more evidence against her that will be coming out, if so, it's really looking bad for her.  Let the evidence come out.  The TMZ video just confirmed what we already knew, she was trying to set him up, with a video that was done in 2013, she started this in the beginning.  

She just can't admit, that she is a liar, a gold digger, & she was using JD, to further her career & he finally had enough of her abuse.  The evidence she claims there are tons of, is against her, it's shown us who she really is.  Look at how fast she tried to end JD's career, in the end, I truly hope that she is fired from everything and blacklisted from the Hollywood industry, I have seen actors, news anchors, fired for less, yet she is still on the AQ2 movie, why are they (the higher up's) protecting her, why?  Hopefully someday we will find out.   I don't wish any harm to come to AH, just that she doesn't deserve to live in that industry any longer. She is just a horrible person for what she has done not just to Johnny Depp, but how she is using this industry to push her career. It's Sickening and Telling, she has to go.  #JusticeforJohnnyDepp M. Hedgcoth, WCMF
